org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor

类 StackTraceSampleCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor.StackTraceSampleCoordinator

  • public class StackTraceSampleCoordinator
extends Object
    A coordinator for triggering and collecting stack traces of running tasks.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StackTraceSampleCoordinator(akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem, int sampleTimeout)
      Creates a new coordinator for the job.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cancelStackTraceSample(int sampleId, Exception cause)
      Cancels a pending sample.
      void collectStackTraces(int sampleId, org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.ExecutionAttemptID executionId, List<StackTraceElement[]> stackTraces)
      Collects stack traces of a task.
      void shutDown()
      Shuts down the coordinator.
      scala.concurrent.Future<StackTraceSample> triggerStackTraceSample(org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.ExecutionVertex[] tasksToSample, int numSamples, scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration delayBetweenSamples, int maxStackTraceDepth)
      Triggers a stack trace sample to all tasks.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StackTraceSampleCoordinator

        public StackTraceSampleCoordinator(akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem,
                                   int sampleTimeout)
        Creates a new coordinator for the job.
        参数:
        sampleTimeout - Time out after the expected sampling duration. This is added to the expected duration of a sample, which is determined by the number of samples and the delay between each sample.

    • 方法详细资料

      • triggerStackTraceSample

        public scala.concurrent.Future<StackTraceSample> triggerStackTraceSample(org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.ExecutionVertex[] tasksToSample,
                                                                         int numSamples,
                                                                         scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration delayBetweenSamples,
                                                                         int maxStackTraceDepth)
        Triggers a stack trace sample to all tasks.
        参数:
        tasksToSample - Tasks to sample.
        numSamples - Number of stack trace samples to collect.
        delayBetweenSamples - Delay between consecutive samples.
        maxStackTraceDepth - Maximum depth of the stack trace. 0 indicates no maximum and keeps the complete stack trace.
        返回:
        A future of the completed stack trace sample

      • cancelStackTraceSample

        public void cancelStackTraceSample(int sampleId,
                                   Exception cause)
        Cancels a pending sample.
        参数:
        sampleId - ID of the sample to cancel.
        cause - Cause of the cancelling (can be null).

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shuts down the coordinator.

        After shut down, no further operations are executed.

      • collectStackTraces

        public void collectStackTraces(int sampleId,
                               org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.ExecutionAttemptID executionId,
                               List<StackTraceElement[]> stackTraces)
        Collects stack traces of a task.
        参数:
        sampleId - ID of the sample.
        executionId - ID of the sampled task.
        stackTraces - Stack traces of the sampled task.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - If unknown sample ID and not recently finished or cancelled sample.
